spec_data.Name: perl-GraphViz
spec_data.Description:
This module provides an interface to layout and image generation of
directed and undirected graphs in a variety of formats (PostScript, PNG,
etc.) using the "dot", "neato", "twopi", "circo" and "fdp" programs from
the GraphViz project (http://www.graphviz.org/ or
http://www.research.att.com/sw/tools/graphviz/).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:00:45 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Interface to the GraphViz graphing tool
